_comment: Template: recommended maxTokens for local models on Strix Halo (4-tier architecture).
Copy this file into your target project's .opencode/ directory.
Tier 1 Orch (Qwen2.5-14B): 64K context → 32K output leaves ~32K for input.
Tier 2 Coder (Qwen3-Coder-30B-A3B): 48K context → 24K output leaves ~24K for input.
Tier 3 Reviewer (Llama-3.3-70B GGUF): 32K context → 16K output leaves ~16K for input.
Tier 0 Utility (Qwen2.5-3B GGUF): 8K context → 4K output leaves ~4K for input.
If you switch to cloud models, remove or raise these limits.
